Settings: Send transaction email when order status is changed. The transaction emails are defined in System > Order Statuses.
Postavke: Slanje transakcijskih emailova kod promijene statusa. Transakcijki emailovi definiraju se u Sustav > Statusi narudžbe.

Settings: By default Magento protects order state to be manually set to Complete and Closed. With this option you can override such behaviour.
Postavke: Po defaultu Magento ne dopušta manualnu promjenu stanja narudžbe u Complete i Closed. Pomoću ove opcije moguće je promijeniti to ponašanje.

Settings: % order(s) status has been changed to %
